Zinzy Waleson Geene

About

Heya, I'm Zinzy, and I've been yelling at Internet clouds since 1997. I'm an IndieWeb enthusiast, and a Design Manager making tools for people at work.

My biggest strength is also my biggest weakness — I see things and ask "Okay great, but why?" Welcome to my website, where I come to link and think. Learn more
